typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '  SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[GL_Desc]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[end_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Desc,Category,Cash_Flow_Code),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Desc,Category,Cash_Flow_Code),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_GL_Desc = GL_Desc,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_end_datetime = end_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('2999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('2999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_', $ProcessName, $FileName),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		GL_Desc = Relation_GL_Desc,
		Category = Relation_Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRow
